title: Interview: Ike Barinholtz Tackles Thanksgiving Politics In 'The Oath'
description: It's Tuesday: Sam talks to actor Ike Barinholtz about his new film 'The Oath,' which he wrote, directed, and stars in alongside Tiffany Haddish. They discuss Ike's big break as Morgan Tookers on 'The Mindy Project,' his own personal stuffing recipe, and playing basketball back home in Chicago with a local community organizer. Tweet @NPRItsBeenaMin with feels or email samsanders@npr.org.

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: His new movie, co-starring Tiffany Haddish, is about surviving Thanksgiving in an era of political division.
